title: Manufacturing Engineer I
details: Design, build, and implement stand-alone web applications to greatly improve manufacturing execution.
Support the operation for manufacturing requirement sets and Manufacturing Execution System models.
Proactively deploy system improvements as site requirements change to ensure smooth operations.
Participate in the continuous enhancement of manufacturing processes by applying creative, technologically advanced solutions.
projects: Maintenance Online Logbook – A website for maintenance operations to track machine downtime issues and tooling replacement logging for better data analysis and visualization.
Fire Extinguisher Online Inspection – A website for EHS personnel to improve the inspection process of fire extinguishers in the manufacturing plant, using QR codes for easy scanning and tracking.

title: Process Engineer I
details: Conducted experiments to evaluate and optimize processes, including data collection, processing, and analysis.
Performed root cause analysis and implemented corrective, containment, and preventive measures for nonconforming products.
Evaluated process output in real-time for priority products and devices.
Qualified new direct and indirect materials used in production processes.
Analyzed yield and loss trends, contributing to yield enhancement initiatives.
projects: Plating Loss Monitoring – A Power BI-based dashboard system for tracking plating-related losses weekly, enhancing data analysis and visualization.

title: Custom Software Engineer Associate (Java)
location: eBloc 2, W Geonzon St., Cebu City, Cebu
details: Develop and maintain backend solutions for enterprise and client-facing websites and applications using Java, Spring Boot, and RESTful APIs.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to design, implement, and deploy scalable backend services.
Integrate databases, authentication, and third-party services to support dynamic and secure web platforms.
Participate in code reviews, debugging, and performance optimization to ensure high-quality deliverables.
Contribute to documentation and best practices to support maintainability and knowledge sharing.
